nested.max-nested-complexity-depth-name: "when following redirects"::"does not count redirects from previous calls against the redirect limit"

fns-with-duplicated-code.name: "makes a :GET request with the composed url object"
"makes a :POST request with the composed url object and data"
"makes a :PUT request with the composed url object and data"
"makes a :DELETE request with the composed url object"
"when making REST requests"::"should build a new HTTP POST request"
"when making REST requests"::"should build a new HTTP PUT request"
"when making REST requests"::"when streaming downloads to a tempfile"::" build a new HTTP GET request without the application/json accept header"
"when making REST requests"::"when streaming downloads to a tempfile"::"build a new HTTP GET request with the X-Remote-Request-Id header"
"when making REST requests"::"when streaming downloads to a tempfile"::"yields the tempfile containing the streamed response body and then unlinks it when given a block"
"when making REST requests"::"when streaming downloads to a tempfile"::"fetches a file and yields the tempfile it is streamed to"

fn-args.max-arg-name: "should have content length validation middleware after compressor middleware"
